keyFacts: The invoice is dated December 26, 2003, and includes multiple shipments.
Total charges for the invoice amount to USD $31.81.
Shipments were picked up on December 18 and delivered on December 19 and December 22, 2003.
The sender for multiple shipments is Lauren Kwaniner, associated with NYSG LLC.
Several recipients are mentioned, including Jeff Schantz, Bob Pepro, and Bella Klein.
